articles.title: IBM Close to Buying Confluent in $11 Billion Deal, WSJ Says - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: International Business Machines Corp. is in advanced negotiations to acquire data infrastructure firm Confluent for around $11 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

articles.description: Yardeni turns less bullish on Magnificent Seven as growth moderates

articles.title: Japan Confirms Deeper GDP Decline, Backing Takaichi’s Stimulus - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Japan’s economy shrank in the three months through September, the government confirmed in a revised report, giving some justification for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s stimulus package announced last month.

articles.title: A mom thought her daughter was texting friends before her suicide. It was an AI chatbot. - CBS News
articles.description: Parents warn AI chatbots on Character AI sent sexually explicit content to their 13-year-old daughter.

articles.title: Huge Wall Street call: Morgan Stanley's new Tesla analyst downgrades stock over valuation concerns - CNBC
articles.description: The analyst downgraded Tesla's stock to equal weight from overweight.

articles.title: Fine against Southwest Airlines for 2022 winter storm cancellations waived by Department of Transportation - CBS News
articles.description: Under a 2023 settlement reached by the Biden administration, Southwest agreed to a $140 million civil penalty after the company canceled thousands of flights during a winter storm in 2022​.

articles.title: 45 Stocking Stuffers That'll Have Everyone Raving About Your Gift-Giving Skills — And They're All Under $25 - BuzzFeed

articles.title: Why Diesel Fuel Is More Expensive Than Gas In The US But Not In Europe - Jalopnik
articles.description: Diesel fuel is more expensive than gas in the U.S. thanks to taxes, but Europe taxes gasoline more to try and encourage drivers to use more efficient fuels.

articles.title: Woman wanted by FBI for allegedly defrauding Banc of California - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: A 73-year-old woman accused of defrauding the Banc of California of about $14.7 million nearly a decade ago remains wanted by the FBI.

articles.title: Bessent says U.S. will finish the year with 3% GDP growth, sees 'very strong' holiday season - CNBC
articles.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the economy will end the year on strong footing and said the president was disappointed in economic coverage in the media.

articles.title: 102-year-old SF landmark will reopen to public for first time in years - SFGATE
articles.description: The Huntington Hotel, perched atop San Francisco’s Nob Hill, is set to finally welcome guests again when it reopens in the spring of 2026.

articles.description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon has hit back at Trump Media CEO Devin Nunes over claims the lender “debanked” the group for political reasons under Joe Biden.

articles.title: Legendary Palm Springs restaurant goes up for sale, recipes included - SFGATE
articles.description: Palm Springs favorite Billy Reed’s, which opened in 1975, has been listed for $7.5 million as its current owner prepares to retire.

articles.title: Trader Joe’s Holiday Dip That Always Sells Out Is Back, and Fans Are Buying 5 at a Time - Allrecipes
articles.description: Trader Joe’s popular Sweet Cannoli Dip is back for the holidays, and fans are sharing creative ways to enjoy this seasonal favorite. See why fans stock up on this limited-time item every year.

articles.description: "For the most part, AI is going to do great stuff for mankind, like tractors did, like fertilizers did, like vaccines did."

articles.description: DOT proposed a plan to make cars less efficient when Americans are already paying record high energy bills. You can comment on the plan now.
